response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and functionality. We believe its value extends far beyond its tangible components, making it worth more than $1,000,000 to us. Given its unique features and the exclusivity it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece of cutting-edge technology and craftsmanship that could significantly enhance your lifestyle or business operations. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
